channel.title: apply-series on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in apply-series on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: Reading in multiple files without loops
item.description: Reading in multiple files to append them is quite common in muy field. Let’s go through a couple ways you can do that in R.

item.title: Let's Get Apply'ing
item.description: When programming we want to write code that iterates well, we do this through loops . Let’s Get Apply’ing is based on the very well-known mtcars dataset built-in to R . We’ll only use two columns, just to keep it simple .
